name: Iron Convoy
storyline:
The world has fallen.

Once, highways were filled with travelers, traders, and families. Now, they are battlegrounds. Civilization crumbled, leaving only factions, raiders, and the desperate struggle to survive.

You are one of the few still standing. With nothing but a beaten-down vehicle and your wits, you set out into the wasteland. Will you build a convoy, forge alliances, and carve your own path? Or will you become just another story lost to the sand?

The road is yours to take. Survive, fight, conquer.
summary: Iron Convoy is a turn-based tactical survival game set in a brutal post-apocalyptic world. Manage your convoy, battle enemies, gather resources, and make tough decisions to survive. In this unforgiving world, only the strongest endure!
